title: Reconcile Annual Physical Inventory
description: After a full wall-to-wall physical inventory count, an accountant must reconcile the physical counts with the system records and post the financial adjustment.

tasks.description: Upload the final physical count file into the inventory system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The physical counts are loaded into the system.

tasks.description: Run a variance report comparing the system's on-hand quantities to the physical counts.
tasks.expected_outcome: A report is generated showing all items with discrepancies (shrinkage or overages).

tasks.description: Calculate the total financial value of the net variance.
tasks.expected_outcome: The total value of the inventory adjustment is calculated.

tasks.description: Post the inventory adjustments to update the system quantities and send the financial entry to the general ledger.
tasks.expected_outcome: The system inventory is updated to match the physical count, and the financial impact is recorded.
